testcase.title: verify sort option stickiness when various operations are performed on Marked List

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "All Databases"
I select search "Advanced Search"

substeps.message: Text of textInput Search Term is .
Text of textInput Search Term is TI=oil*.
textInput Search Term  'TI=oil*' text was entered.
Search finished with no error message

steps.title: I perform search by query "TI=oil*" on page "Advanced Search"
I access page "Result Summary" for the last searched record title

substeps.message: First Author -- A to Z sort type selected from More dropdown
the sort option First Author -- A to Z was selected

steps.title: I select the non-default sort option "First Author -- A to Z" on page "Result Summary"

substeps.message: Check link number all on page.
link number all on page  checked.

steps.title: I mark "all on page" checkbox(es)
I send the selected record(s) to 'Marked List'
I access page "Marked List"

substeps.message: The sort option is not sticky when we navigate to Marked List page

steps.title: I check that sort option "First Author -- A to Z" is sticky on "Marked List" page

substeps.message: First Author -- Z to A sort type is not selected either from list or More dropdown

steps.title: I select the non-default sort option "First Author -- Z to A" on page "Marked List"

substeps.message: Text of textInput Search Term is .
Text of textInput Search Term is TI=oil*.
textInput Search Term  'TI=oil*' text was entered.
Search finished with no error message

steps.title: I perform another search with field "Title" and query "TI=oil*" on page "Advanced Search" from page "Marked List"
I access page "Result Summary" for the last searched record title

substeps.message: Proper sort option is selected after performing : new search operation

steps.title: I verify the non-default sort option "First Author -- Z to A" is sticky after performing "new search operation"
I perform another search with field "Title" and query "oil" on page "Basic Search"
I verify the non-default sort option "First Author -- Z to A" is sticky after performing "new search operation"
